attributes.action: give local authorities the power to seize 4x4 motor vehicles that are parked inconsideratley or driven agressivley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: vehicles of this class because of their size present a greater threat to other road users than other types of private vehicles.  The 'off road' capability of these vehicles is used mainly in an urban environment to park on pavements thereby endangering other road users.  Mis-sold as being safer, they are driven dangerously and are the cause of more accidents and injuries in percentage terms than other private vehicles
